description: Demolition of existing single storey rear extension and conservatory,and erection of single storey rear extension.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.	Reason:  As required  by Section 91 of  the Town  and Country Planning  Act  1990,  as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.	Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
Please submit a site location plan to scale 1:1250, independent of any proposed works
Please provide existing floor plans and elevations, to scale 1:50 or 1:100, with the associated scale bar or measurements shown on the plan
Condition 14 - Neighbourhood Engineer has reviewed information provided and is satisfied this can now be discharged.
Condition 17 - Environmental Health have reviewed information provided and is satisfied this can now be discharged.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate repeat works with all trees to rear of property and not affecting public amenity.Recommendation:No objections.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable works to reduce overhang on the road by a simple and minor crown lift via the removal of the 4 lowest branches.Recommendation:Approve.
